General.Name: Osisko Development Corp.
General.Description: Osisko Development Corp., together with its subsidiaries, acquires, explores, and develops precious metals resource properties in Canada, Mexico, and the United States. The company explores for precious and base metal, gold, silver, copper, lead, and zinc deposits. Its flagship asset is the 100% owned Cariboo Gold Project, which covers an area of approximately 192,000 hectares consisting of 443 mineral titles located in British Columbia, Canada. The company also holds a portfolio of marketable securities. Osisko Development Corp. is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 1100 Avenue des Canadiens-de-Montréal, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3B 2S2
